long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch Youtube videos with dual subtitles using this overlay.
Click on the foreign word to get a dictionary reference.
You can also activate "hints", contextual translations of foreign words shown on top of them.
